data.comment: The match is underway at Serra Dourada.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Marlon Freitas (Goianiense GO) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Bragantino are pushing forward but Leandrinho's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Throw-in for Bragantino at Serra Dourada.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 8, Bragantino push forward at Serra Dourada and Leandrinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goianiense GO defence.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Raul of Bragantino gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 14, Bragantino's Leandrinho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Bragantino drives forward and Ytalo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 14, Ytalo (Bragantino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
In the minute 16, Goianiense GO pushes forward through Dudu, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Goianiense GO's Ze Roberto breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 17, Goal kick for Bragantino at Serra Dourada.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Goal! Bragantino have got their heads in front thanks to a Claudinho strike.
In the minute 22, In Goiania Goianiense GO attack through Janderson Santos de Souza. The finish is off target, however.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In the minute 23, Goianiense GO surge into the attack at Serra Dourada but Ze Robertoâ€™s header is off-target.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Joao Victor for Goianiense GO gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 25, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Gustavo Ferrareis is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Goianiense GO are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 26, Gustavo Ferrareis returns to the field for Goianiense GO after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Janderson Santos de Souza levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 28, Great play from Nicolas Vichiatto to set up the goal.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 31, Leandrinho for Bragantino drives towards goal at Serra Dourada. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In Goiania Goianiense GO attack through Eder Ferreira. The finish is off target, however.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Throw-in Bragantino.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Ytalo of Bragantino is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 35, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Ytalo (Bragantino) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 37, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Goianiense GO.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Bragantino will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO's Edson breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Bragantino at Serra Dourada.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 41, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Bragantino throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Goianiense GO have a dangerous throw-in.
Goianiense GO are coming forward and Ze Roberto gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 42, Bragantino have a goal kick.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 45, Ytalo (Bragantino) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Heber Roberto Lopes will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Throw-in for Bragantino at Serra Dourada.
Goianiense GO's Marlon Freitas is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Bragantino's area.
Ytalo of Bragantino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick Bragantino.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Goiania.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the home team a throw-in.
The away team have replaced Leandrinho with Wesley Souza. This is the first substitution made today by Mauricio Barbieri.
In the minute 46, Weverson is replacing Edimar for Bragantino at Serra Dourada.
The away team replace Uillian Correia with Weverton.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
In the minute 48, Bragantino drive upfield and Claudinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goianiense GO defender.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In the minute 49, Ytalo hits the post with a header! Very nearly a goal there for Bragantino in Goiania.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jean for Goianiense GO who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jean for Goianiense GO is back on the field again.
In the minute 52, Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Attention is being given to Goianiense GOâ€™s Eder Ferreira and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Bragantino.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 55, Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Throw-in Bragantino.
In the minute 56, Goianiense GO's Marlon Freitas misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Serra Dourada.
Goianiense GO's Eder Ferreira looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 57, Bragantino's Claudinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Goianiense GO defender.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Bragantino's Bruno Tubarao misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Bragantino.
Goianiense GO apply pressure and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Marlon Freitas but the ball hits the post!
In the minute 61, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leo Ortiz (Bragantino) has received a first yellow card.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 66, Matheus Vargas is on a sub for Chico for Goianiense GO.
Vagner Mancini is making the team's first substitution at Serra Dourada with Hyuri replacing Ze Roberto.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Ricardo Ryller of Bragantino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 68, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Edson (Goianiense GO) has received a yellow card from Heber Roberto Lopes.
In the minute 71, Bragantino needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 73, In Goiania Bragantino's Ytalo is caught offside.
Vagner Mancini (Goianiense GO) is making a third substitution, with Everton Felipe replacing Gustavo Ferrareis.
Goianiense GO's Matheus Vargas attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 74, Heber Roberto Lopes awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the home team a throw-in.
Goianiense GO's Matheus Vargas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Bragantino at Serra Dourada.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Janderson Santos de Souza for Goianiense GO gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 79, Bragantino have a goal kick.
Bragantino make their fourth substitution with Luis Phelipe replacing Wesley Souza.
Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Goiania.
In Goiania Goianiense GO drive forward through Everton Felipe. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 81, Important block from the Bragantino defence as Hyuri fires in a strike for Goianiense GO.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
In the minute 82, Bragantinoâ€™s Julio Cesar is on his feet again at Serra Dourada.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Goiania to check on Julio Cesar, who is grimacing with pain.
Matheuzinho is replacing Janderson Santos de Souza for the home team.
Arnaldo is on a sub for Dudu for Goianiense GO.
In the minute 83, Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Goianiense GO are coming forward and Hyuri gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
The match at Serra Dourada has been interrupted briefly for a check on Joao Victor, who is down injured.
In the minute 89, Joao Victor has recovered and rejoins the match in Goiania.
Everton Felipe gets his shot on target but fails to score for Goianiense GO.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Goiania.
Goianiense GO drives forward and Everton Felipe gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Goianiense GO.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Bragantino!
Bruno Tubarao (Bragantino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In Goiania, Bruno Tubarao (Bragantino) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Goianiense GO take a 2-1 lead thanks to Matheuzinho.
The away team replace Ricardo Ryller with Jan Hurtado.
